title: Tom Segura
itunes:title: Tom Segura
itunes:subtitle: Talented stand-up comedian and writer Tom Segura (NETFLIX’S DISGRACEFUL, MOSTLY STORIES) is on this week’s episode of Unqualified! First, Anna and Tom discuss the differences between being an actor and a comedian (5:32) and Tom tells us his favorite thing
description:
Talented stand-up comedian and writer Tom Segura (NETFLIX’S DISGRACEFUL, MOSTLY STORIES) is on this week’s episode of Unqualified! First, Anna and Tom discuss the differences between being an actor and a comedian (5:32) and Tom tells us his favorite thing to do after a show (10:30). Then, they have an insightful discussion on overcoming self-doubt (15:00), Anna talks about how the plot of House Bunny was developed (21:25), and Sim reflects on how he and Anna first met (29:40). After that, Tom answers some wild deal-breakers (39:27) and Anna reveals her ideal acting roles (54:20). Later, they call Laura (1:01:05), who is struggling with her boyfriend’s interest in having a threesome, and Megan, whose new boyfriend won’t stop talking about his past sexual experiences with other women. Anna, Sim and Tom give some amazing advice. Tune in and enjoy! 

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
